MOB - 移动前端UI框架
首页
文档
定制
  • Get Start
  • CSS
  • Components
  • Javascript

page

page 用来显示一个满屏页面的架子

See the Pen KwgyMp by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

topbar

topbar 为页面顶部的工具栏, 有随页面固定和随页面滚动两种。要注意其与 Header 的区别

See the Pen raMYLj by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

header

header 为页面头部通栏封面或广告。例子: examples/audio-player.html

See the Pen LEROZQ by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

content

page-content用来表示page中navbar, topbar,aside以外的主要内容。page-content 会自动进行垂直布局。 例子: examples/audio-player.html

See the Pen RNGjRe by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

aside

aside 是侧边栏。Mob 支持两种形式的侧边栏。一个是进入时覆盖的侧边栏，一个是进入时推原来页面的侧边栏

See the Pen OPROXG by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

bottombar

bottombar是底部导航栏

See the Pen ZYpapp by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

table

See the Pen zxKPKw by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

grid

grid 为九宫格自动排版的组件

See the Pen XJjzNM by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

button

See the Pen VYKrmd by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

tip

See the Pen GgjONP by mobframe (@mobframe) on CodePen.

icon

小图标，请求查看example

helper

  • Close icon

关闭按钮图标

<button type="button" class="close" aria-hidden="true">&times;</button>
  • Carets

插入记号

<span class="caret"></span>
  • Quick floats

快速浮动

<div class="pull-left">...</div>
<div class="pull-right">...</div>
  • Clearfix

清除浮动

<div class="clearfix">...</div>
  • Showing and hiding content

显示和隐藏内容

<div class="show">...</div>
<div class="hidden">...</div>
  • Blocks

块状内容

<div class="panel panel-default">
  <div class="panel-body">
    Basic panel example
  </div>
</div>
  • Badge > 徽章样式
<span class="badge">read</span>
